t: Reader Question: Recommend a Good PVC Cutter
s: Ratcheting PVC cutters are the easiest to use, at least at the inexpensive and non-powered side of things. Non-ratcheting cutters are usually meant for cutting soft tubing. And if you are cutting soft tubing, maybe even garden hose – I haven’t tried it – then read up on what we said about soft tubing cutters. Knipex vs NWS Pliers – Which Brand ...
